name: Dark Onirisme (chapter 2)
description:
TEN YOUNG TEENAGERS ARE TRAPPED INTO A STRANGE VIRTUAL WORLD...

They don't know why they're here, they don't know how they got here in the first place... But they know one thing for sure: they have to escape from this hell! Unfortunately, it will be not easy for them... The world around them is twisted and makes nonsense. Moreover, nightmarish creatures are lurking from the shadows and crave to kill them all.

Dark Onirisme (chapter 2) is a visual novel with some puzzles and point-and-click gameplay. This chapter is the sequel to the first game "Dark Onirisme".

WARNING CONTENT:

This is a horror game using depictions of blood, dead bodies, and nightmarish creatures to distress and scares the player (well...at least, it tries to do so...). Consequently, it may not be suited to a very sensible public.

YOU HAVEN'T PLAID "DARK ONIRISME" YET?

You can check this just here!

CREDITS:

Story, art (sprites, UI & CG) and code: Overtired_FOX

music/sound effects from: www.zapsplat.com
